body_text:
Release note says 6.0
So 2 inconsistencies to fix



Sent via the Samsung Galaxy S7 edge, an AT&T 4G LTE smartphone
…
-------- Original message --------
From: Derek Murray <notifications@github.com>
Date: 11/27/17 6:20 PM (GMT-06:00)
To: tensorflow/tensorflow <tensorflow@noreply.github.com>
Cc: johngrabner <john_grabner@hotmail.com>, Mention <mention@noreply.github.com>
Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] Installation says to use cuDNN v6.1, but NVIDIA only offers 6.0 and 7.0.4 (#14805)


Yep, looks like 5.1 was changed to 6.1 without making sure that that exists :).

—

body:
Release note says 6.0
So 2 inconsistencies to fix



Sent via the Samsung Galaxy S7 edge, an AT&T 4G LTE smartphone


-------- Original message --------
From: Derek Murray <notifications@github.com>
Date: 11/27/17 6:20 PM (GMT-06:00)
To: tensorflow/tensorflow <tensorflow@noreply.github.com>
Cc: johngrabner <john_grabner@hotmail.com>, Mention <mention@noreply.github.com>
Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] Installation says to use cuDNN v6.1, but NVIDIA only offers 6.0 and 7.0.4 (#14805)


Yep, looks like 5.1 was changed to 6.1 without making sure that that exists :).

—
